name: rocky coastline
description: This is a section of eroded natural stone formations along the beach.  It will take a little hopping and jumping to climb around on them.

name: rocky coastline
description: This is a section of eroded natural stone formations along the beach, the water lapping and splashing at the edges.

name: submerged shoals
description: This is a section of eroded natural stone formations along the beach that has dipped below the surface of the water.

name: tide pool
description: A shallow pool of salt water, often filled with interesting life.
